/* webhardAdmin.boxManage.selectBoxList */ SELECT A.UUID , A.DOMAIN_ID , A.DOMAIN_CODE , A.OWNER_TYPE , A.OWNER_ID , A.OWNER_NAME , A.BOX_NAME , A.BOX_MAX_SIZE , A.BOX_CURRENT_SIZE , A.USE_YN , A.BLOCK_YN , A.BLOCK_REASON , A.BOX_PATH , TO_CHAR(A.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.UPDATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATED_DATE , TO_CHAR(A.DELETED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DELETED_DATE , B.CURRENT_SIZE_BYTE FROM WH_BOX_LIST A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(FILE_SIZE) AS CURRENT_SIZE_BYTE, BOX_UUID AS UUID FROM WH_FILE_LIST WHERE TRASHBIN_FLAG != 'D' OR TRASHBIN_FLAG IS NULL GROUP BY BOX_UUID ) B ON A.UUID = B.UUID
AND A.DOMAIN_ID = #{domainID}
AND UPPER(OWNER_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || TRIM(#{searchWord}) || '%')
AND UPPER(OWNER_ID) LIKE UPPER('%' || TRIM(#{searchWord}) || '%')
AND ( UPPER(OWNER_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || TRIM(#{searchWord}) || '%') OR UPPER(OWNER_ID) LIKE UPPER('%' || TRIM(#{searchWord}) || '%') )
OWNER_ID OWNER_NAME USE_YN CURRENT_SIZE_BYTE CREATED_DATE
ASC DESC
